name: Pancake
overview: A beautiful pancake managed to escape, after being prepared and baked, from the house where so many children were ready to eat it. Now he has decided to roam around the world in search of all those good fruits that manage to enhance it and hops here and there to grab them as the birds make them fall. But the pitfalls and dangers for our cake are really many: hens, chicks the towering men will try to grab it and eat it. But if our cake is really clever, it can also grab the items the birds drop for additional points based on how many were collected. Will you be able to guide the cake and help it survive? Published as Urca in Italy in Hit Parade C64 n.48 (Settembre 1990) and New Special PlayGames n.32 (giugno 1990).
